title: 112_hr3800
content:
The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 17, 2012. Additionally, the Act extends the expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 18, 2012. SEC. 4. Extension of Airport Improvement Program authorizes $1,344,535,519 from October 1, 2011, to February 17, 2012, with funds available until September 30, 2012. Project grant authority extended to February 17, 2012. Section 40117(l)(7), 41743(e)(2), 44302(f)(1), 44303(b), 47107(s)(3), 47115(j), 47141(f), and 49108 of title 49, United States Code, are all amended to change dates from January 31, 2012, and February 1, 2012, to February 17, 2012, and February 18, 2012, respectively. Section 106(k)(1)(H) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to allocate $3,692,555,464 for the period from October 1, 2011, to February 17, 2012. Section 48101(a)(8) is also amended to allocate $1,044,541,913 for the same period. Additionally, Section 48102(a)(16) is amended to allocate $64,092,459 for the period from October 1, 2011. SEC. 9. ESSENTIAL AIR SERVICE.
Section 41742(a)(2) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to allocate $54,699,454 for the period from October 1, 2011, to February 17, 2012. The curr_chunk is about the roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Vice President of the United States as President of the Senate.
